```php

session_start(); //sets session variables as default

$cookie = 'http://example.com/';
setcookie("MyCookie", $cookie, time()+3600); //random cookie name and expiry date
header("Location: /mypage.php?cookie=$cookie"); //redirect to mypage.php with the cookie set on session
?>
```
